title:
Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush, Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush with Pressure Sensor, Black HX3681/24, removes up to 3x more plaque vs. a manual toothbrush, signals when your 2 minutes is up,
pressure sensor to prevent gun recession, includes 1 electric toothbrush, 1 SymplyClean brush head, 1 USB charger (without wall adaptor),
descriptions:
**Introducing the Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush - Your Ultimate Oral Care Partner!**

**Elevate Your Oral Hygiene Routine with the Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush, HX3681/24, in a sleek Black Finish!**

**Unlock the Power of Sonic Technology:**
Experience the unmatched efficacy of the Philips Sonicare 4100 with its advanced Sonicare technology. This rechargeable electric toothbrush removes up to 3 times more plaque than a manual toothbrush, ensuring your smile stays bright and healthy.

**Stay on Pace with QuadPacer & SmarTimer:**
Enjoy optimal brushing with the QuadPacer, which signals the time spent on each mouth section, and the SmarTimer, which ensures you brush for a perfect 2 minutes - the recommended daily brushing time for a monthâ€™s worth of manual brushing!

**Pressure Sensing for Gum Health:**
Say goodbye to overbrushing. The pressure sensor flashes red when you apply too much pressure, safeguarding your gums and preventing recession. Maintain a gentle yet thorough brushing experience for healthier gums.

**Customizable Cleaning Experience:**
Choose from 2 intensity settings to tailor your cleaning experience to your needs. Whether you prefer a light or firm brush, the Philips Sonicare 4100 has you covered.

**Slim & Ergonomic Design:**
Designed with a slim ergonomic shape and a familiar brush head, the Philips Sonicare 4100 is as comfortable as it is effective. The SimplyClean (C1) brush head fits snugly, ensuring every tooth gets the attention it deserves.

**Complete Kit Includes:**
- 1 Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush (HX3681/24)
- 1 SimplyClean (C1) Brush Head
- 1 USB Charger (wall adaptor not included)

**Why Choose the Philips Sonicare 4100?**
- Enhanced plaque removal
- Optimized brushing time
- Gum health protection
- Customizable intensity settings
- Sleek, comfortable design

Upgrade your oral care routine with the Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush. Order now and take the first step towards a healthier, brighter smile!
